00005 //Definitions
00006 #define InteractionCollection  SystemModel->InteractionCollection
00007 #define AtomCollection  SystemModel->AtomCollection
00008 //Definitions of keywords-phrases found in this format
00009 #define CMD_CARTCOORD             "G E O M E T R Y  ***  3D  Molecule  ***"
00010 #define CMD_CHEMICAL_SHIFTS       "Stephen K. Wolff & Georg Schreckenbach"
00011 #define CMD_J_COUPLINGS           "*  NMR spin spin coupling tensor calculation  *"

00017 /**
00018 * @brief Constructor of ADF format
00019 * @param filename Name of the file to be read.
00020 * @param model The model where the imported data will be saved.
00021 */
00022 ADF::ADF(System::String^ filename, Model^% model )
00023 {
00024         SystemModel=model;
00025         FileName=filename;
00026         ReadingFile = gcnew StreamReader(filename);
00027     FormatName="ADF";
00028 }
00029 
00030 /**
00031 * @brief Main function for opening and reading file
00032 * @return Returns false if the format does not seem to be correct.
00033 */
00034 bool ADF::LoadFile(void)
00035 {
00036         String^ Command=gcnew String("");
00037         bool  OK = true;
00038 
00039         //Initializing flags to false, meaning that no any frame was yet read
00040         read_onceOR=false;
00041         read_onceCS=false;
00042         read_onceJC=false;
00043 
00044         //Turn off Refreshing for faster importing
00045         AtomCollection->Refreshing=false;
00046 
00047 
00048         //Read the file until the end of it and as long flag OK is true
00049         while (!ReadingFile->EndOfStream  && OK)
00050         {
00051                 Command= ReadLine() ;
00052 
00053                 //Reading different sections of the file according to keywords-phrases
00054                 if(OK)
00055                 {
00056                         //Read coordinates
00057                         if(Command->Contains(CMD_CARTCOORD))
00058                         {  
00059                                 OK=read_CARTCOORD();
00060                                 read_onceOR=true; //read at least once
00061                         }//Read chemical shields        
00062                         else if(Command->Contains( CMD_CHEMICAL_SHIFTS)) 
00063                         { 
00064                                 OK=read_CHEMICAL_SHIELDING();
00065                                 read_onceCS=true;//read at least once
00066                         } //Read J-couplings
00067                         else if(Command->Contains(CMD_J_COUPLINGS)) 
00068                         {
00069                                 OK=read_J_COUPLINGS();
00070                                 read_onceJC=true;//read at least once
00071                         }
00072                 };
00073 
00074                 //Wrong format inside senctions
00075                 if(!OK) throw gcnew Exception("Problem in Reading File in Line "+LineCount+".");
00076 
00077         };
00078 
00079         // Check if file is a valid ADF format, having at least one of the sections
00080         if(!(read_onceOR ||  read_onceCS || read_onceJC )) return false;
00081 
00082         //Turn on again Refreshing which causes calculation of bonds
00083         AtomCollection->Refreshing=true;
00084         ReadingFile->Close();
00085         return true;
00086 }
00087 
00088 /**
00089 * @brief Main function for reading coordinates from the file
00090 * @return Returns false if the format does not seem to be correct.
00091 */
00092 bool ADF::read_CARTCOORD()
00093 {
00094         String^ fileline=gcnew String("");  //line
00095         int AtomID=1;                                           //Saving the atom ID
00096 
00097         //Readin initial dummy lines
00098         fileline=ReadLine() ; 
00099         // ===============
00100         fileline=ReadLine() ; 
00101         //
00102         fileline=ReadLine() ; 
00103         //
00104         fileline=ReadLine() ; 
00105         //ATOMS
00106         fileline=ReadLine() ; 
00107         //=====                            X Y Z                    CHARGE
00108         fileline=ReadLine() ; 
00109         //                             (Angstrom)             Nucl     +Core       At.Mass
00110         fileline=ReadLine() ; 
00111         //                    --------------------------    ----------------       -------
00112 
00113         fileline="";
00114         //Read the section until the end of it which is an line with less than 2 chars
00115         while ((fileline=ReadLine())->Length>2 )
00116         {
00117         //Number of Fields: 8, Isotope index: 1, Mass index: 7, XYZ index: 2,3,4
00118          ExtractIsotopeAndCoordinates(fileline, FormatName, read_onceOR, AtomID,
00119                                                                    8, 1, 2, 3, 4, 1.0, 7, AtomCollection);
00120         };
00121 
00122         return true;
00123 
00124 }

00126 /**
00127 * @brief Main function for reading Chemical shieldings from the file
00128 * @return Returns false if the format does not seem to be correct.
00129 */
00130 bool ADF::read_CHEMICAL_SHIELDING()
00131 {
00132         int number;                                             //number of fields in each line
00133         String^ fileline=gcnew String("");  //line
00134         array<String^>^numbers = nullptr;   // Matrix of the fields after splitting of a line
00135         String^ delimStr = " ,";            //seperator of fields
00136         array<Char>^delimiter = delimStr->ToCharArray(); //Conversion to char array
00137         int AtomID;                                               //Saving the atom ID
00138 
00139         //Saving the starting index of this interaction for case of multiple frames
00140         static int startIndexCS;
00141         if(!read_onceCS) startIndexCS=InteractionCollection->Count;
00142 
00143         //It is chemical shielding, so conversion to shift is needed
00144         ToShift= true;
00145 
00146         //Read until end of senction
00147         while (!(fileline=ReadLine())->Contains("NORMAL TERMINATION"))
00148         {
00149                 int j=0;
00150                 //****  N U C L E U S : C(2)
00151                 if (fileline->Contains("****  N U C L E U S :"))
00152                 { 
00153                         //(blank)
00154                         fileline=ReadLine() ;
00155                         //ADF-GUI atom: C(2)
00156                         fileline=ReadLine() ;
00157 
00158                         number=3;
00159                         numbers = nullptr;
00160                         numbers=fileline->Split(delimiter,StringSplitOptions::RemoveEmptyEntries );
00161                         if(number>numbers->Length) throw gcnew Exception("Problem in Reading CHEMICAL SHIELDING");
00162 
00163                         //Naking of "C(2)"
00164                         for(int ii=0;numbers[2][ii]!=Convert::ToChar("(");) 
00165                         {
00166                                 numbers[2]=numbers[2]->Remove(ii,1);
00167                         }
00168                         numbers[2]=numbers[2]->Remove(0,1);
00169                         numbers[2]=numbers[2]->Remove(numbers[2]->Length-1);
00170                         AtomID=Convert::ToInt32(numbers[2]);
00171 
00172                         while (!(fileline=ReadLine())->Contains(
00173                                 "********************************************************************************"))
00174                         {
00175                                 if(fileline->Contains("===  TOTAL NMR SHIELDING TENSOR (ppm)"))
00176                                 {
00177                                         fileline=ReadLine() ; 
00178                                         //
00179                                         fileline=ReadLine() ; 
00180                                         //        ***********************************
00181                                         fileline=ReadLine() ;
00182                                         //        CARTESIAN AXIS REPRESENTATION
00183                                         fileline=ReadLine() ;
00184                                         //      
00185                                         fileline=ReadLine() ;
00186                                         //        ==== total shielding tensor
00187                                         fileline=ReadLine() ;
00188                                         //         -----------------------------------
00189 
00190                                         //Reading interaction matrix and creating interaction
00191                                         fileline=ReadLine();
00192                                         //Number of Fields: 3, XYZ index: 0,1,2
00193                                         ExtractInteractionMatrix3x3(fileline, "Chemical Shielding", 
00194                                                 (Atom^)AtomCollection[AtomID], (Atom^)AtomCollection[AtomID], 1.0,
00195                                                 read_onceCS, startIndexCS, j, 3, 0, 1, 2, 
00196                                                 Units::ppm, InteractionKind::CShielding, 
00197                                                 SystemModel->RefFrameCollection[1], 
00198                                                 InteractionCollection);
00199                                                 
00200                                 };// "total shielding tensor"
00201                         };//Searching lines  for "total shielding tensor"
00202 
00203                 }; //Nucleus
00204 
00205         }; //CHEMICAL SHIELDING
00206 
00207         return true;
00208 }

00210 /**
00211 * @brief Main function for reading J-Couplings from the file
00212 * @return Returns false if the format does not seem to be correct.
00213 */
00214 bool ADF::read_J_COUPLINGS()
00215 {
00216 
00217         int number;                                             //number of fields in each line
00218         String^ fileline=gcnew String("");  //line
00219         array<String^>^numbers = nullptr;   // Matrix of the fields after splitting of a line
00220         String^ delimStr = " ,";            //seperator of fields
00221         array<Char>^delimiter = delimStr->ToCharArray(); //Conversion to char array
00222         int AtomID1, AtomID2; //Saving ID of the first and the second atom
00223         double value;             //Scalar value of the j-coupling
00224         bool DoubleDeclaration; //Flag for if an j-coupling is duplicated
00225 
00226         //Saving the starting index of this interaction for case of multiple frames
00227         static int startIndex;
00228         if(!read_onceJC) startIndex=InteractionCollection->Count;
00229 
00230         //Read until end of senction
00231         while (!(fileline=ReadLine())->Contains("NORMAL TERMINATION"))
00232         {
00233                 int j=0;
00234                 //  Nucleus 1 (C) perturbing nucleus 2 (C)
00235                 if (fileline->Contains("Nucleus") && fileline->Contains("perturbing nucleus") )
00236                 { 
00237                         //Read the atom IDs which interact through j-coupling
00238                         number=7;
00239                         numbers = nullptr;
00240                         numbers=fileline->Split(delimiter,StringSplitOptions::RemoveEmptyEntries );
00241                         if(number>numbers->Length) throw gcnew Exception("Problem in Reading J-Couplings");
00242 
00243                         AtomID1=Convert::ToInt32(numbers[1]);
00244                         AtomID2=Convert::ToInt32(numbers[5]);
00245 
00246                         //Check for doubles, especially the ones with reverse order
00247                         //quite slow, checking one by one
00248                         DoubleDeclaration=false;
00249                         for each (int i in InteractionCollection->Keys)
00250                         {
00251                                 if(((Interaction^ )InteractionCollection[i])->IntKind==InteractionKind::Jcoupling)
00252                                         if((((Tensor^ )InteractionCollection[i])->A->ID==AtomID1 &&
00253                                     ((Tensor^ )InteractionCollection[i])->B->ID==AtomID2) ||
00254                                    (((Tensor^ )InteractionCollection[i])->A->ID==AtomID2 &&
00255                                         ((Tensor^ )InteractionCollection[i])->B->ID==AtomID1)) 
00256                                          DoubleDeclaration=true;
00257                         };
00258 
00259                         while (!(fileline=ReadLine())->Contains("Principal Axis Representation"))
00260                         {
00261                                 //read only if it is not a repeated data
00262                                 if(fileline->Contains("total calculated spin-spin coupling:") && !DoubleDeclaration)
00263                                 {
00264 					::Matrix3x3 ^ J_Coupling=gcnew ::Matrix3x3();
00265                                         
00266                                         //Try read scalar quantity
00267                                         //isotropic    k=     180.984                              j=     137.514      
00268                                         number=5;
00269                                         fileline=ReadLine() ;
00270                                         numbers = nullptr;
00271                                         numbers=fileline->Split(delimiter,StringSplitOptions::RemoveEmptyEntries );
00272                                         if(number!=numbers->Length)  throw gcnew Exception("Problem in Reading J-Coupling matrix");
00273 
00274                                         if (!Double::TryParse(numbers[4], value)) return false;
00275 
00276                                         //Set the scalar value to the diagonal of the matrix
00277                                         J_Coupling[0]=value; J_Coupling[4]=value; J_Coupling[8]=value;
00278                                         J_Coupling[1]=0.0; J_Coupling[2]=0.0; J_Coupling[3]=0.0; 
00279                                         J_Coupling[5]=0.0; J_Coupling[6]=0.0; J_Coupling[7]=0.0;
00280 
00281                                         //Create j-coupling interaction, unit and reference frame
00282                                         Tensor^ nInteraction=gcnew Tensor((Atom^)AtomCollection[AtomID1],
00283                                                 (Atom^)AtomCollection[AtomID2],
00284                                                 InteractionKind::Jcoupling, J_Coupling);
00285                                         nInteraction->unit=Units::Hz;
00286                                         nInteraction->Frame=SystemModel->RefFrameCollection[1];
00287 
00288                                         //If this is the first time reading this section(read_onceJC==false)
00289                                         // just add it in the system else replace the previous frame value(if exists)
00290                                         if(read_onceJC)
00291                                                 try{InteractionCollection[j+startIndex]=nInteraction;j++;}
00292                                         catch(String ^ e)  {throw gcnew Exception("Problem in Elements: "+e);}
00293                                         else InteractionCollection->Add(nInteraction);
00294 
00295                                 };// "total calculated spin-spin coupling"
00296                         };//Searching lines  for "total calculated spin-spin coupling"
00297 
00298                 }; //Nucleus
00299 
00300         }; //J-Couplings
00301 
00302         return true;
00303 }
